EmailTemplate.subject: Helping you Succeed with Platinum Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Tricentis Support is Raising the Bar Platinum Support Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, We know how important your software testing is. We understand the countless hours of planning, training, and maintenance that have gone into building your test environment. It is our goal to help you succeed. We are proud to offer our best tool for your success: Tricentis Platinum Support, and ensure that your employees are provided with the best possible support from Tricentis. Platinum Support Benefits With Platinum Support, you will receive the following benefits: Get in Touch Participation in the Tricentis Tosca Testsuite beta program. You will get a first look at new developments, and the chance to provide feedback and influence implementation before it even hits the market. Dedicated support contact. You will receive a dedicated support expert who is familiar with you, your goals, and your test environment. These experts are your personal lifelines; proactive in supporting the requirements and questions your team faces. Customized notifications. No need to be bombarded with notifications – unless you want to be. You decide how to configure your notifications to best suit your needs. You can define the frequency, nature, and distribution of our support bulletins. Customized reporting. Tricentis Platinum Support will keep you up to date with customized reports tailored to your test environment. You decide what your reports should include, who should receive it, and the frequency of the report. Immediate emergency support. Immediate emergency support. In case of an urgent problem, our Platinum Support team is available for emergency remote sessions. These sessions allow a support expert to connect to your test environment, come alongside your team, and assist in analyzing the problem with you. Fast response times. As if our Gold support response rate wasn’t fast enough, now our Platinum Support customers will receive response times twice as quickly. Get in Touch Start 2015 with the security of knowing that Tricentis Platinum Support is there to make you and your team to success.
